guiTeacher.interfaces

Interface Clickable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Visible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Accordion, Button, Checkbox, ClickableGraphic, CustomImageButton, FileOpenButton, FullFunctionPane, ImageTextButton, Link, Pane, RadioButton, RadioButtons, ScrollableDragablePane, ScrollablePane, SearchBox, SimpleTable, TextBox, TextField, TypingPane

    public interface Clickable
extends Visible
    A Visible object that can be clicked on. Note that a Clickable has no effect if it is not in at least a Clickable Screen
    Author:
    bnockles

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      The action that is executed when this object is clicked
      void hoverAction()
      The action that is executed when this object is hovered
      boolean isHovered(int x, int y)
      Defines the bounds within the object can be clicked
      void setAction(Action a)
      Change the action associated with this Clickable

      • Methods inherited from interface guiTeacher.interfaces.Visible

        getAlpha, getHeight, getImage, getWidth, getX, getY, isAnimated, isVisible, move, setAlpha, setVisible, setX, setY, unhoverAction, update

    • Method Detail

      • isHovered

        boolean isHovered(int x,
                  int y)
        Defines the bounds within the object can be clicked
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinates of the mouse within context of immediate parent container
        y - y-coordinates of the mouse within context of immediate parent container
        Returns:
        true if this Clickable is hovered by mouse
